actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an additional year to amend governing instruments to meet requirements for gift of split interest to charity.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to allowable deductions from a decedent's gross estate for transfers for public, charitable, and religious uses, to extend through December 31, 1980, the period during which governing instruments may be amended to meet the requirements for a gift of a split interest to charity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow an additional year to amend governing instruments to meet requirements for gift of split interest to charity.
